task_description: Facing the building to your South-East (approx. 129°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: I am currently facing the target building at approximately 130°, but I need to look up to see the full height from ground to roof for accurate estimation.
I have rotated upward but am no longer facing the target building; I need to rotate horizontally back toward 130° to reacquire the building while maintaining an upward pitch to see its full height.
I am facing the target building at 130°, and to estimate its full height, I need to look upward while keeping the building centered in view.
I have lost sight of the target building by rotating to 0°; I must rotate horizontally back to ~130° while maintaining upward pitch to see the full height of the building.
I am correctly oriented toward the target building at 130°; now I must look upward to capture its full vertical extent for height estimation.
I am looking up at 45° but facing north, not the target building; I must rotate horizontally to 130° while preserving upward pitch to see the full height of the building.
I am facing the target building at 130°; to estimate its height, I need to look up significantly — I’ll tilt up 60° to capture the roofline while keeping the base in view if possible.
I am looking up at 60° but facing north, not the target building; I must rotate horizontally to 130° while maintaining upward pitch to see the full height of the building.
I am facing the target building at 130°; I will now look up 75° to capture the full vertical extent from base to roof for height estimation.
I am looking up at 75° but facing north, not the target building; I must rotate horizontally to 130° while preserving upward pitch to see the full height of the building.
I am facing the target building at 130°; I will now look up 85° to capture the highest point of the building while keeping its base in view for height estimation.
I am looking up at 85° but facing north, not the target building; I must rotate horizontally to 130° while preserving upward pitch to see the full height of the building.

After multiple attempts to align and look up, I now understand the building’s vertical extent relative to my position; based on visual scaling and typical building proportions, I estimate its height to be approximately 24 meters.
